mapper.select: select f.id, f.cid, f.name, f.uid, f.del_flag, f.create_time, f.update_time, f.battery_deposit,f.tenant_id,f.percent, f.model_type,f.model_battery_deposit from t_franchisee f left join t_franchisee_bind_electricity_battery fb on f.id = fb.franchisee_id where f.del_flag=0 and fb.electricity_battery_id=#{id}
